Donald Trump 's victory in the 2024 presidential election sent shares of Tesla surging as much as 15% Wednesday, propelled by CEO Elon Musk 's prominent role in the Republican's White House campaign and expectations that the company will benefit from proposed tax cuts and a deregulatory blitz. Trump name-checked Musk, the world's richest man, during his victory speech Wednesday morning, calling him a 'super genius.

articles.title: Elon Musk Bought CNN?
articles.author: Jordan Liles
articles.excerpt: Argentina President Javier Milei said in November 2024, "Elon Musk bought that filthy 'woke' bastion that was CNN."
articles.summary:
Claim:
Tech entrepreneur Elon Musk bought CNN in November 2024.
A rumor circulating online shortly after former U.S. President Donald Trump's reelection victory in November 2024 claimed that X owner, Tesla CEO and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk bought CNN.
Argentine President Javier Milei promoted the rumor while speaking in front of the Argentine Chamber of Commerce on Nov. 7 — the same day Reuters reported on Milei's plans to meet with Musk and Trump in the U.S. the following week. Numerous social media users and some publishers also shared the purported news as fact, with some citing Milei's remark.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Twitter takeover math has changed
articles.author: Dan Primack
articles.summary:
Elon Musk overpaid for Twitter when he bought it for $44 billion in late 2022, after unsuccessfully trying to renegotiate or renege.
Now a new conventional wisdom is emerging: Twitter is a loss leader for the rest of Elon Inc.
Zoom in: These broader wins may be cold comfort for investors who helped finance Musk's buyout of Twitter. Revenue has plummeted, while Fidelity recently valued its shares at a 78.71% discount to cost.
Yes, but: All of this is dependent on Musk and Trump remaining in each other's good graces over the next four years, which is anything from a sure bet.

Elon Musk joined President-elect Donald Trump on a Wednesday phone call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, according to multiple media reports.Unnamed sources who spoke with The Washington Post and Axios said Zelensky felt the call was positive.Axios reported that sources briefed on the details of the call said the talk between Trump and the Ukrainian leader lasted approximately 25 minutes, and Zelensky congratulated Trump on his victory in this week's residential election.

But with Musk cozying up to Trump, and the president-elect promising to slash the types of regulations that Musk abhors, Wall Street is betting Tesla, on balance, will be a beneficiary.During his victory speech, Trump also praised Musk's SpaceX and thanked Musk for delivering Starlink Wi-Fi terminals to Hurricane-stricken parts of the U.S. That all leaves Musk with plenty of reasons to be optimistic that a second Trump administration will pay healthy dividends to him and his businesses.

articles.title: Fact Check: Elon Musk Did NOT Buy CNN In November 2024
articles.excerpt: Did Elon Musk buy CNN in November 2024? No, that's not true: A CNN spokesperson told Lead Stories "there is...
articles.summary:
Network Denies
Did Elon Musk buy CNN in November 2024? No, that's not true: A CNN spokesperson told Lead Stories "there is no truth in rumors of a sale or change in ownership of CNN whatsoever." The assertion was made by Argentinian President Javier Milei and was picked up by Argentinian news outlets, but he offered no proof of such a sale. An article on a website that publishes fake stories about famous people said in October 2024 that Musk was considering buying CNN. The site describes itself as satire, and the original article was clearly labeled as satire.

Did Elon Musk purchase Ford?

No, Elon Musk did not purchase Ford.
WHAT WE FOUND
Elon Musk did not buy Ford Motor Company, and there is no indication that he has any plans to do so.

articles.title: No, Elon Musk has not bought out Ford
articles.author: Liam O'Dell
articles.excerpt: If you thought Elon Musk buying Twitter/X was bad enough – what with many commentators noting the social media platform's influence on the recent US election and how it helped secure a victory for…
articles.summary:
If you thought Elon Musk buying Twitter/X was bad enough – what with many commentators noting the social media platform's influence on the recent US election and how it helped secure a victory for Donald Trump – then rumours are now circulating that the tech billionaire and Tesla founder has now bought out Ford. So… did Ford get bought by Elon Musk?
On YouTube, a number of videos have claimed Musk has purchased the competitor, but these were published between last year and last month, suggesting there's little truth to the claims.

articles.title: No, Elon Musk did not buy Ford
articles.author: Emery Winter
articles.excerpt: The CEO of Tesla did not buy Ford Motor Company. The false rumor has been spreading on YouTube since June 2023.
articles.summary:
In early November 2024, a rumor that Elon Musk, the CEO of Tesla, Starlink and X, purchased Ford Motor Company began spreading online, prompting many to
Stu emailed us to ask if the rumor was true.
THE QUESTION
Did Elon Musk purchase Ford?
THE SOURCES
THE ANSWER
No, Elon Musk did not purchase Ford.
WHAT WE FOUND
Elon Musk did not buy Ford Motor Company, and there is no indication that he has any plans to do so. The rumor appears to be based on a May 2023 announcement of a partnership between Tesla and Ford.

articles.title: Why Are People Congratulating Elon Musk for the 2024 Election Results?
articles.author: Elissa Noblitt
articles.excerpt: Why are people congratulating Elon Musk for the election? Folks everywhere, from X (formerly Twitter) users to the Italian prime minister, have bid the billionaire congrats.
articles.summary:
Musk has been a staunch supporter of Trump since 2022. By Elissa Noblitt
Published Nov. 7 2024, 2:47 p.m. ET Source: mega
Following the 2024 triumph of Republican president-elect Donald Trump in the early hours of Wednesday, Nov. 6, his supporters were, of course, thrilled — not least of all his high-profile backers like disgraced influencer Andrew Tate and X owner Elon Musk. The latter has supported Trump for a large portion of his political career and has become a right-wing figurehead over the past few years.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Net Worth Crosses $300 Billion Post Tesla's 30 Percent Share Surge
articles.author: MENAFN
articles.excerpt: In the past five days after
articles.summary:
(MENAFN- Live Mint) In the past five days after Republican candidate Donald Trump's victory in the US presidential election, Tesla CEO Elon Musk 's net worth crossed the $300 billion mark and his automaker's shares skyrocketed over 30 per cent, according to Forbes' Real-Time Billionaires list.
The list states that Musk is currently the only person on the planet who has a net worth over $300 billion and has a wealth of $304 billion.
On Friday, Tesla's shares jumped 8.19 per cent to touch $321.22 billion.

articles.title: Jimmy Kimmel Responds to Elon Musk Calling Him a ‘Propaganda Puppet': ‘Listen Kermit, You Bought Twitter'
articles.author: Ellise Shafer
articles.excerpt: Jimmy Kimmel didn't hold back when responding to Elon Musk's X post calling him an "insufferable nonsense propaganda puppet."
articles.summary:
Jimmy Kimmel didn't hold back when responding to Elon Musk's X post calling him an 'insufferable nonsense propaganda puppet.'
'At least my children like me, you know,' Kimmel said during his monologue on Thursday night's episode of 'Jimmy Kimmel Live.' Musk posted about Kimmel on Wednesday after the late-night host teared up while talking about Donald Trump's victory in the U.S. election.
'The guy who paid people a million dollars a day to vote for Donald Trump is calling me a propaganda puppet,' he continued.

articles.title: Jimmy Kimmel Issues Bold Response to Elon Musk's 'Insufferable' Criticism
articles.excerpt: The owner of X, formerly Twitter, shared his scathing opinion on the social media platform.
articles.summary: Jimmy Kimmel whipped out a bold quip in response to criticism levied against him by Elon Musk, who was none too pleased by the comedian's reaction to Donald Trump's presidential win.The latter started it all when he replied to a post on his social media platform, X, that included a video of Kimmel's response to the projected results of the 2024 presidential election. In the clip, the late-night host called it a "terrible night" for women, children, immigrants, healthcare, journalism, justice, social security, NATO, and more.

articles.title: Has Elon Musk bought Ford? Speculation surrounds Tesla founder after Donald Trump's US election win
articles.author: Liam O'Dell
articles.summary:
If you thought Elon Musk buying Twitter/X was bad enough – what with many commentators noting the social media platform's influence on the recent US election and how it helped secure a victory for Donald Trump – then rumours are now circulating that the tech billionaire and Tesla founder has now bought out Ford.
On YouTube, a number of videos have claimed Musk has purchased the competitor, but these were published between last year and last month, suggesting there's little truth to the claims.
One of the popular videos found after searching 'Elon Musk Ford' on the site is a 21-minute upload from the channel Elon Musk Rewind, posted on 17 September and with more than 603,000 views at the time of writing.

articles.title: Trump Includes Elon Musk on Call With Zelensky
articles.author: Bob Cronin
articles.excerpt: President-elect puts billionaire on the phone
articles.summary: President-elect Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky have lots to talk about. During his campaign, Trump said he'd end Ukraine's war with Russia within 24 hours while declining to say which side he wants to win. They began Wednesday with a 25-minute phone conversation, Axios reports. At one point, when Zelensky mentioned that Elon Musk's Starlink satellite internet service was a big help to his country's war effort, Trump said the billionaire happened to be with him at Mar-a-Lago.
